Function.Description: The getContextPtr function gets the memory address of memory allocated to a specified context in the local server.

Brief.Overview: The getContextPtr function gets the memory address of memory allocated to a specified context in the local server.
Brief.Usage: Use the getContextPtr function to get the memory address of memory allocated to a specified context in the local server.

Argument.Name: mycontextname
Argument.Note: The name of an open context.

Syntax.Return: Memory Address - A number containing the address of the start of memory of the specified context. 0 is returned if an error was encountered.
